CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence | customer managed storage
CurrentVersion.description: In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention - Ability to fetch the original file resulting in policy match as evidence | customer managed storage
OldVersion.description: In the alerts triage & incident management experience, the admin can access a copy of the file that was restricted by DLP. The original file is uploaded to a customer managed storage (Azure blob). The admin uses this data to analyze the contents to confirm the full set of data that was exfiltrated to assess severity.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
CurrentVersion.description: The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Introduction of secure workflow to bypass legal holds and retention policies
OldVersion.description: The first release of Priority cleanup enables admins to create a recurring exception to delete items under a broader retention policy and/or legal hold on Exchange workload. Creating a Priority cleanup will require a separate security role, multiple approvers, and will have a complete audit trail.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar split view when surface is set to month view
CurrentVersion.description: When viewing multiple calendars in month view, users will be able to select "split view" to see those calendars displayed side by side. This feature will be available in new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Calendar split view when surface is set to month view
OldVersion.description: When viewing multiple calendars in month view, users will be able to select "split view" to see those calendars displayed side by side. This feature will be available in new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
CurrentVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Enhanced app discovery
OldVersion.description: With enhanced app discovery users can easily discover and use apps they've previously used in group chats, channels, and meetings, allowing them to consent to use the app everywhere in Teams with one click.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
CurrentVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Retention Labels are available for Loop pages and components
OldVersion.description: Organizations that rely on Microsoft's records management capabilities in Purview can now include Loop content in their workflows with Retention Labels on Loop pages and components. There's an in-app experience when a label is applied or a record is locked.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant Updates
CurrentVersion.description: We are updating the scheduling assistant view to help users have better readability. Some of these changes are in alignment to customer the feedback. These changes will also improve the grid lines, availability view, adding combined availability bar and much more. These updates will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Scheduling Assistant Updates
OldVersion.description: We are updating the scheduling assistant view to help users have better readability. Some of these changes are in alignment to customer the feedback. These changes will also improve the grid lines, availability view, adding combined availability bar and much more. These updates will be available in the new Outlook for Windows and web. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: First phase of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: The first phase PST (a.k.a. Outlook Data File) support in the new Outlook for Windows provides read-only access to Mail items within *.pst files. Users will be able to open *.pst files, read their emails within *.pst files, and search *.pst files for emails. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the *.pst files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this preview. Next releases will expand PST support capabilities.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Initial version of PST support in new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: The initial version of PST support in new Outlook for Windows will enable users to open "*.pst" files (a.k.a. Outlook Data Files), read all e-mail messages within the "*.pst" file, and search e-mail messages within the ".pst" file. This initial support is limited to Mail items and is read-only. All Calendar, Contacts, and Tasks data saved in the "*.pst" files are still there, but they cannot be accessed in this initial version. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Multiple camera view for Teams Room on Windows
OldVersion.description: Teams Room on Windows will support up to four single stream cameras that will be shown to remote meeting attendees. With multiple camera view, remote meeting attendees will have the ability to follow all the action in the room and manually toggle between views from the room that they want to see.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse administrators can export Pulse data
CurrentVersion.description: Viva Pulse administrators can now search for and export a user's Pulse report, user level, and tenant-level data to a .xlsx file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Pulse - Pulse administrators can export Pulse data
OldVersion.description: Viva Pulse administrators can now search for and export a user's Pulse report, user level, and tenant-level data to a .xlsx file.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution replaces old data sync solution for syncing forms responses to Excel
CurrentVersion.description: Forms is introducing a new data sync solution with higher reliability to sync forms responses data to Excel. The older version of live data sync will be replaced by the newer solution.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New data sync solution replaces old data sync solution for syncing forms responses to Excel
OldVersion.description: Forms is introducing a new data sync solution with higher reliability to sync forms responses data to Excel. The older version of live data sync will be replaced by the newer solution.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
CurrentVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Host and attendee interaction visibility for multi-room Mesh events
OldVersion.description: Mesh event attendees can now see raised hands and reactions from attendees in other rooms during large, multi-room Mesh events. This creates a greater sense of audience feedback as a whole across all rooms in a Mesh event and increases total audience engagement.  Additionally, event hosts will now be able to move between all rooms in a multi-room Mesh event.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: People Hub improvements in new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: In new Outlook for Windows, the People Hub offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: People module improvements on new Outlook for Windows
OldVersion.description: In the new Outlook for Windows, the people module offers a streamlined contacts interface with a single view of each person, automatically linking duplicates and enriching them with organizational profiles.  #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Multi-geo support for shared Loop workspaces
CurrentVersion.description: This ensures data storage for shared Loop workspaces is in the correct geo. M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the group's geo, while non-M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the creator's preferred data location.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365 app: Microsoft Loop - Multi-geo support for shared Loop workspaces
OldVersion.description: This ensures data storage for shared Loop workspaces is in the correct geo. M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the group's geo, while non-M365 group-owned workspaces are created in the creator's preferred data location.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archived Teams' schedules no longer visible
CurrentVersion.description: We've improved the schedule view by hiding archived teams' schedules. This reduces clutter, allowing you to focus on active teams and their schedules.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Archived Teams' schedules no longer visible
OldVersion.description: We've improved the schedule view by hiding archived teams' schedules. This reduces clutter, allowing you to focus on active teams and their schedules.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Insights - Data export for Viva Glint and Viva Insights data
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow Viva Insights Analyst to download a CSV file containing Viva Glint survey results joined with Viva Insights organizational data.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
CurrentVersion.description: Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Math Progress
OldVersion.description: Accelerate student math skills with Microsoft Teams: Math Progress.
